TopicTitle: Speedin' Deemin' - Fast and the Kerbalus - Final Round

Articles.Content:
Congrats to GreyDragon70 for his epic endurance run! If you have not had the chance, jump on over to the previous race and catch his number one spot winning performance video!

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/101132-Fast-and-the-Kerbalus-KSC2-Dash

---

Now for the FINAL EVENT for this series!

We all love speed, so here is your chance to go full throttle with no restrictions on distance, SPEEDIN' DEEMIN'

This is an ALL OUT drag race with the only parts restrictions being you can ONLY use STOCK Jet Engines\Rockets\LFO Engines

Demonstration video here!

Rules:

  1. Any structural part\mod is allowed
  2. Only STOCK fuel and Engines\Rockets\Jet Engines are allowed
  3. Craft must hover by either Kerbal Foundries or a hover script\engine hover
  4. No Flying or hopping permitted
  5. This is for top speed, no need to MAINTAIN the top speed
  6. Press F3 to capture the top speed and screenshot the speed and post!

Scoring is simply the top speed and will be broken into three segments, one for Stock, NEAR and FAR

My Speed is 453m/s

Stock Aero

1. GreyDragon70 - 552m/s (

HOLY CRAP!)

2. Will Hamic - 294m/s

3.

FAR Aero

1.

2.

3.

NEAR Aero

1.

2.

3.

Edited December 14, 2014 by Jatwaa
New to this series... is there a specific terrain/course one must use? or any terrain is fairgame? Previous series allow rovers... is that still allow, as i have not install the hover mod?

I'd say go for it, but with rovers you will have to deal with variable terrains. The hover pods allow the nullification of that since we are using the ocean as a "salt flats" so to speak. But the main goal is to have fun and grab a top speed! I'll even add a section for rovers so we can keep it even since the terrains will cause a bit of difficulty.
Woot! Was able to get my speeds up!

Weeeeelp Get your designs back up and able! GreyDragon70 pushed up the throttle and hit 552m/s!!!!!

Can you take the crown?
